name: ABCD For Kids - Alphabet Tracing
description:
Fun and simple educational app for free to help your toddler learn to trace letters of the alphabet. This is app for you ABCD for Kids - Alphabet Tracing.

ABCD for Kids - Alphabet Tracing is a free alphabet teaching app that makes learning fun for children, from toddlers all the way to preschoolers and kindergartners. It features a series of tracing games to help kids recognize letter shapes and put their alphabet knowledge to use in fun matching exercises. Any toddler, kindergartener or preschool age child can learn English and the English alphabet simply by following the arrows with their finger as they complete tracing games!

ABCD for Kids - Alphabet Tracing is more than just a kid-friendly educational app, it is also designed to be family friendly app. The interface keeps toddlers focused on alphabet reading and writing.


Features:
- Colorful early education app to learn the English alphabet for children.
- ABC tracing game, Drag and drop matching game.
- Encouraging feedback.
- No In-app purchases. 
- Minimal and kids friendly ads.
